snippet: Ilya Bryzgalov stopped 17 shots for this third straight shutout and fourth in five games to lead the Philadelphia Flyers to a 3-0 win over the visiting Devils on Tuesday night.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers defeat New Jersey Devils, 3-0; other results noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JEFF Z. KLEIN
byline.contributor: Jeff Z. Klein reported from Boca Raton, Fla.

lead_paragraph: Ilya Bryzgalov stopped 17 shots for this third straight shutout and fourth in five games to lead the Philadelphia Flyers to a 3-0 win over the visiting Devils on Tuesday night.

headline.seo: Flyers, Behind Bryzgalov, Shut Out Devils
headline.main: Hot Goalie Leads Flyers to Victory Over Devils
headline.print_headline: Hot Goalie Leads Flyers To Victory Over Devils
